footAbout: A site that sells products online. Allows users to create a purchase order, choose a payment method and deliver the order on the Internet. Having chosen the necessary goods or services, the user usually has the opportunity to select a method of payment and delivery on the site right away. The main difference between the Internet store and the traditional one is in the type of the trading platform. A typical store needs a trading hall, shop windows, price tags, as well as sellers, cashiers and experienced consultants, the online store has the entire infrastructure implemented programmatically.
greeting: Mamas tycoons has now grown to become a much loved and trusted name for baby clothing, maternity essentials and children's fashion. We have good collection of baby dresses, Pure cotton baby clothes. With a carefully curated collection of designs in peppy colours and chic combinations that are elegantly stylish, our line of clothing has something for everyone's liking/ parents looking for practical, well-designed outfits for their children. faqHeading1: Are your products safe for all skin types?
faqDesc1: Yes, our products are dermatologically tested and suitable  for all skin types. However, we recommend doing a patch test before full application.
faqDesc2: Absolutely! All our products are 100% cruelty-free and never tested on animals.
faqHeading3: Do your products contain parabens or sulfates?
faqDesc3: No. Our formulations are free from parabens, sulfates, and other harmful chemicals.
faqHeading4: Can I use your products if I have sensitive skin?
faqDesc4: Yes. We offer a specific range designed especially for sensitive skin. Always check product labels and consult your dermatologist if unsure.
blogDesc1: Tips, tutorials, and reviews on foundations, lipsticks, eyeshadows, and more. Learn how to master every makeup look—from everyday natural to full glam.
blogDesc2: Explore skincare routines, product reviews, and ingredients for glowing, healthy skin. Perfect for all skin types including oily, dry, and sensitive.
blogDesc3: Quick tricks, dos and don’ts, and insider beauty secrets to make your routine easier, faster, and more effective.
blogDesc4: Honest reviews of the latest beauty products—from drugstore gems to luxury must-haves. Know what’s worth your money.
blogDesc5: Discover hair products, styles, and treatments to keep your locks strong, shiny, and healthy—no matter your hair type.
blogDesc6: Focus on clean beauty with eco-friendly, cruelty-free, and non-toxic cosmetics. Ideal for conscious beauty lovers.
blogDesc7: Stay updated with the latest beauty trends, seasonal makeup looks, celebrity routines, and industry news.
blogDesc8: Homemade face masks, scrubs, and treatments using kitchen ingredients. Beauty that’s fun, affordable, and natural.
blogDesc9: Tips on packing, skincare routines, and beauty essentials for staying flawless while traveling.
blogDesc10: Deep dives into popular cosmetic ingredients like retinol, hyaluronic acid, or niacinamide—explaining what works and why.

termsIntro: You should carefully read the following Terms and Conditions. Your purchase indicates that you have read and accepted these Terms and Conditions.
terms1Content1: The information contained on the site www.adamclick.com is updated periodically. Photographs and colors illustrating the products are non-contractual. If errors occur, adamclick shall not be held responsible.
terms1Content2: In an attempt to provide you with increased value, we may include third-party links on our site. These linked sites have separate and independent privacy policies. We therefore have no responsibility or liability for the content and activities of these linked sites. Nonetheless, we seek to protect the integrity of our site and welcome any feedback about these linked sites (including if a specific link does not work).
terms2Content: By using our site, you consent to our Privacy Policy.
returns1Content1: We have a cancellation rule for orders which haven’t left the store for delivery.
returns1Content2: All orders that leave the store to be delivered, but get cancelled – we will charge INR 10/- as cancellation fee (driver expenses).
returns2Content1: We have a 7-day exchange rule. The receipt/proof of purchase must be submitted, and the purchased product must be unused and in its original packaging.
returns2Content2: We cannot offer cash refunds for anything sold both at the store and online. You will receive an electronic credit voucher to use within 6 months.
returns3Content1: A credit note is issued against any returned item. It must be claimed within 6 months.
returns3Content2: Proof of the credit note must be shown when making a claim.
returns5Bullet1: Health and Personal Care items: Bras, panties, and nursing items.
returns5Bullet2: Products purchased during Sales and Promotions
returns6Content1: An email is to be sent to rizwan@adamclick.com with a brief description of the issue.
returns6Content2: Attach a picture of both the item and the receipt.
returns6Content3: A response will be given within 5 working days.
privacyIntro: This Privacy Policy describes how your personal information is collected, used, and shared when you visit or make a purchase from www.adamclick.com (the “Site”).
deviceInfoTitle: Information We Collect Automatically When you visit the Site, we automatically collect certain information about your device, including your web browser, IP address, time zone, and some of the cookies installed on your device. As you browse the Site, we also collect information about individual web pages or products you view, what websites or search terms referred you to the Site, and how you interact with the Site We refer to this automatically-collected information as “Device Information”.
